title: blind babies and their empty bottles
body: It's blind pick, summoner's rift; champion selection. Everyone is claiming their champs, and indicating their "preferred" position. But every game I see "Top or feed" or "duo bot with 'insert name here' or feed'. And then when everyone gives these babies their bottles, they cant even hold their lane because they're babies in-game too.

replies.body:
Or maybe you're the immature one who is taking blind pick too seriously.
They're humans, they're bound to make mistakes, not play well, or simply just trying out something new. 

Maybe you need a bottle of maturity.
What if it is a sis?

Which begs the question:

u bro?

No, I'm obviously a lvl 12 Nuclear Space Helicopter. Rude!

You know why I like waffles more than pancakes? Because waffles have built in syrup holders.
wow waffle man are you even human? can you even recognize that there are over 69 genders? for example i have converted to a furry lion pansexual potato viking demiqueer. How inhuman

Sorry....

u mad bro and/or sis and/or other?

It could be they are practicing at a role they aren't good with so that they can improve. You don't get better by winning. Doesn't excuse the attitude but it explains it.

If I play top lane I will definately lose my lane but I really want to learn to play Irelia, Fiora, and Riven, among many others. Only way I will reach this goal is by losing a lot.

Maybe it's worse in OCE, but it's not super common to see "X or feed" in NA Blind Pick.

Still, whenever I do see that, my response is something like this. "X or feed? Even if we gave you X you'd feed, so why should we bother giving it to you?"
